name: DigiStrider
description:
This game was made in 7 days for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023! Theme: Duality

A world where viruses can take many different shapes, one wolf has the power to coexist in both the real and digital worlds! Using the power of the DigiStrider, Ren can fight against cyber threats of the world!

Explore a dungeon crawler inspired by SMT, Megaman Battle Network, and Earthbound! Use the Chain Link system to chain together moves and exploit your foe's weakness. 

Controls:

WASD & Arrow Keys: Movement

Q & E: Strafe left and right respectively

Space: Select/Advance dialogue

Escape: Pause menu

Credits:

Programming, Art, mostly everything: Xett

Music: DavidKBD (Pink Bloom Pack)

Shader Code: r3tr0_dev (Earthbound background), tcmug (3D Retro Dither)

Please let me know of any bugs!!! Godot 4 still has a lot of weird export issues!
